mean_en: "a person who gives blood or a part of his or her body to be used by doctors in medical treatment; a person or an organization that makes a gift of money
sentence: I am a frequent blood donor because I like helping people.
sentence_trans: 我经常献血，因为我乐于助人。
word_etyma: don给予 ＋ or表名词，人 → 给的人 → donor捐献者
